description:
Snapperfish Limited presents The Best For My Child (TM). Available in English only. 

• A simple, but powerful, decision support tool based on well-known child psychology. The tool explains, in easily understood language, why babies and children act the way they do and the best way to respond to them. 

• Over five years of intensive research into child psychology has been gathered for its development. The ideas presented are intended to strengthen the parent-child relationship, reduce child distress and anxiety, and promote good child self-esteem. Although none of the psychological concepts or interpretations is new, they do differ significantly from popular parenting beliefs and advice, and highlight how much unnecessary trauma many parents unwittingly inflict on their children.

• Therefore, this tool is intended to expose parents to new ways of thinking about parenting, in the hope that they can choose better ways of relating to their children. It is especially appropriate for parents during the first few months and years of their child's life, but also applies to children of all ages. 

• The tool features: ✔ guides (psychological concepts, mantras to follow, patterns to observe, rules to keep, and trouble-shooting) ✔ guide ratings and explanations for difficulty to believe and difficulty to carry out ✔ personalized guides with your child's name and gender so you can read about your own family ✔ multiple reminders for Food Time, Bath Time, and Bed Time, all with a Soon function, help you to keep a consistent daily routine which is very important for young children and a consistent Food + Bath + Bed routine promotes easier bed time patterns in toddlers ✔ Thought For The Day to keep the ideas fresh in your mind ✔ context-sensitive help included within the application.

• The Best For My Child is the mobile application for parents who truly want The Best for their child. See http://www.thebestformychild.com/catalog/ for more information.
